messages.content:
✅ **All Signal 42 line items have been removed (paused)**

I've successfully paused all 3 Signal 42 campaigns:

| Campaign ID | Budget | Status | Impact |
|-------------|--------|--------|--------|
| mb_signal_42_1 | $20,000 | ✓ Paused | Delivery stopped |
| mb_signal_42_2 | $18,000 | ✓ Paused | Delivery stopped |
| mb_signal_42_3 | $12,000 | ✓ Paused | Delivery stopped |

**Total Budget Affected:** $50,000

Since none of these campaigns had started spending yet (all had $0 spend), there's no budget waste. Notifications have been sent to the #adcp-demo Slack channel and email drafts have been generated for the team.
